Title: Neighbors
Overview: A couple with a newborn baby face unexpected difficulties after they are forced to live next to a fraternity house.
production_companies: Universal Pictures, Point Grey Pictures, Good Universe
Cast: Seth Rogen, Zac Efron, Rose Byrne
